question: According to Marxism, What does a rational system of production implies?
option2: Social ownership of means of production
explanation:
In accordance with the theory of Marxism, conflict and politics arise in society because its system of production is not properly organized on a "rational basis". 
A rational system of production implies the following _
a. Highest advancement of technology so aa to get maximum production
b. Social ownership of the means of production and distribution
c. Implementation the universal labour law so as to maximize material production for the fulfilment of social need.
